articles.title: Anne Heche Laid To Rest At Historic Hollywood Cemetery - HuffPost
articles.description: The actor's son said he and his brother "are convinced our Mom would love the site we have chosen for her."
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) Actor Anne Heche has been laid to rest at a storied Los Angeles cemetery alongside many Hollywood luminaries, her family said Tuesday.
